solution:
1800C1 - Powering the Hero (easy version)Idea: Vladosiya TutorialTutorial is loading... Solutiondef solve():
    n = int(input())
    s = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    ans = 0
    buffs = [0] * n
    for e in s:
        if e > 0:
            buffs += [e]
            j = len(buffs) - 1
            while buffs[j] < buffs[j - 1]:
                buffs[j], buffs[j - 1] = buffs[j - 1], buffs[j]
                j -= 1
        else:
            ans += buffs.pop()
    print(ans)


t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    solve()
